ctx: intros T F F_filter f g H Hf.
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop F_filter : Filter F f, g : T -> R H : F (fun x : T => f x <= g x) Hf : filterlim f F (Rbar_locally p_infty) The term "F" has type "(T -> Prop) -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "(T -> Prop) -> R" (cannot unify "Prop" and "R").

ctx: intros T F F_filter f g H Hf.
intros T F F_filter f g H Hf.
exceptions.tactic: pose proof (filter_and _ _ _ H H0) as H1.
exceptions.exn: The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros T F F_filter f g H Hf.

original: intros T F F_filter f g H Hf. apply (filterlim_le F H Hf). intros x H'. apply ClassicalFacts.F. intros H0. pose proof (filter_and _ _ _ H H0) as H1. apply (filter_imp _ _ _ (filtermap_proper_filter' _ f _ (Build_ProperFilter' _ F_filter))) in H1. exfalso; apply (filter_true _ _ H1). intros y _; auto.
